snippet: Mark Flood, an inspiration to younger artists for his singular, under-the-radar vision and methods, has a show coming to the high-end Luxembourg & Dayan gallery.
abstract: Snapshot interview with artist Mark Flood, an inspiration to younger artists, discusses his upcoming exhibit at the high-end Luxembourg and Dayan gallery.
lead_paragraph: Mark Flood, an inspiration to younger artists for his singular, under-the-radar vision and methods, has a show coming to the high-end Luxembourg & Dayan gallery.

headline.seo: Mark Flood, Houston Artist, at Luxembourg & Dayan
headline.main: No ‘Sacred Monster,’ Just a His-Way Artist
headline.print_headline: No ‘Sacred Monster,’ Just a His-Way Artist
